TopicTitle: Is there a mod that will display all part stats/modules in the VAB by right-clicking?

Articles.Content: In the VAB it seem the only info we get is resources. Id like to know things like thrust and if something has a decouper in it.

Kerbal Engineer Redux. It's got a LOT of good options.

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/222685-kerbal-engineer-redux-v1-0

You can also look at stats by right-clicking on the parts in the part catalog.
Erm... But thrust and decoupler info is displayed in VAB. Without right-clicking.

ahhh, but rememeber when I said "right-clicking". THis means when I right click the mounted part thats on other parts on vessel. I do have KER but ill check right now to see if it has that feature......

KER has a hover-over mode that displays part info. It also has a craft summary at the bottom of the screen. Is that what you were looking for?

Ah, found a pic: http://i.cubeupload.com/UbXd4F.png

It's the Build Engineer Overlay.
